jcr:content.jcr:description: The new Torin 6 is here to keep up with whatever you throw its way. This best-selling road shoe is designed for premium performance on any road, any run, and any distance.
jcr:content.jcr:title: Torin 6
jcr:content.pageTitle: The New Torin 6â€” Any road. Any run. Any distance. | Altra Running

customhtml2_11446045.customHTML:
THE NEW TORIN 6

ANY DISTANCE. ANY ROAD. ANY RUN.

It doesn't matter where you run. It doesn't matter how you run. Every run is worth it.

Our best-selling everyday road shoe is designed to work as hard as you do with a new premium design, plush cushioning, and a performance focused fit ready for your next run.

image.alt: 3 Shots of Different Runners in the Torin 6

customhtml2_copy.customHTML: HIGH CUSHION FOR A PLUSH RIDE. The new, performance focused Torin 6 features our Altra EGOâ„¢ MAX midsole foam. This plush cushioning is designed for any road with a responsive underfoot feel. From high-mile runs to high-intensity training, this midsole cushioning offers a plush ride designed to last for endless miles.

customhtml2_copy_cop_229667436.customHTML:
BETTER FIT DESIGNED FOR PERFORMANCE.

High performance demands the right fit. From easy runs to a tempo pace, our improved plush tongue construction and updated molded heel collar are designed for a better fit for whatever the day throws your way. This feature is designed to provide a comfortable, locked-in feel for mile after mile.

customhtml2_11446045.customHTML:
PREMIUM DESIGN FOR A PREMIUM RIDE.

Our updated knit mesh upper offers added comfort and breathability for those looking for a shoe designed for any road running activity. Made to maximize this shoeâ€™s premium comfort, this all-new upper is designed with soft, moisture absorbing fabric to help keep you going on any run, on any road, for any distance.

customhtml2_11446045_1357488265.customHTML: FOOTSHAPEâ„¢ COMFORT FOR EVERY MILE, EVERY RUN, EVERY DAY.

customhtml2_11446045.customHTML: The new Torin 6 features our Standard FootShapeâ„¢ Fit, our most common fit found in Altra shoes. This fit allows your feet to sit naturally and is designed to give you more stability in every step encouraging premium performance for every run.
ANY DISTANCE. ANY ROAD. ANY RUN.
